title: Did Rudy Giuliani propose to borrow a legal tactic from "my cousin Vinnie "?
subtitle: A press conference convened by President Donald Trump ' s legal team was part of a false campaign of misinformation alleging voter fraud in the November 2020 general elections.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The personal lawyer of President Donald Trump Ruddy Giuliani of the United States proposed the use of a legal tactic that was seen in the 1992 film "Cousin Vinnie" in the Court case around 2020.
